scripts.text: SELECT MAX(updated_at) + '.' AS LastUpdatedDate FROM MyTaman_Defects

-- Convert Unit Level for MONET GARDEN (fix data issue from source)
UPDATE [MyTaman_Units]
SET unit_level = 'TERRACE'
WHERE project_id = 92 AND unit_level = 'NA'
SELECT MAX(updated_at) + '.' AS LastUpdatedDate FROM MyTaman_Forms
SELECT id FROM [MyTaman_RFWI_Phases] WHERE id NOT IN (11)

BEGIN TRAN
   DELETE [MyTaman_RFWI_List]
   INSERT [MyTaman_RFWI_List] SELECT * FROM [Stg_MyTaman_RFWI_List]
COMMIT
